title: Application Form: Add character limits on application inputs
body_html:
Fixes #578

It is currently deployed on staging and can be tried out.

I did not go for the HTML maxlength attribute; I thought it would cause negative side-effects (ie. trunking) when pasting text from another source. The counter JS indicates that the limit has been exceeded. The draft can be saved, but the application can't be submitted.

The character limit is 2000 now which I find is not too much. It's characters after all, not words.

Should the new "giving back" field (as introduced in #603) also be character-limited?

body:
Fixes #578

It is currently deployed on [staging](https://rgsoc-teams-staging.herokuapp.com/) and can be tried out.

I did not go for the HTML `maxlength` attribute; I thought it would cause negative side-effects (ie. trunking) when pasting text from another source. The counter JS indicates that the limit has been exceeded. The draft can be saved, but the application can't be submitted.

The character limit is 2000 now which I find is not too much. It's _characters_ after all, not words.

Should the new "giving back" field (as introduced in #603) also be character-limited?
